job_history.work_description: Leader of change for the largest law firm in the Central Pennsylvania area. Responsible for providing professional staff with efficient, up-to-date, secure and stable voice and data communications on a daily basis within budget. Managed a staff of seven information technical professionals and implemented various technical projects and initiatives.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed a staff of seven information technical professionals and implemented various technical projects and initiatives, indicating expert-level mastery in leadership.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Implemented various technical projects and initiatives, suggesting strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Information Technology
skills.explanation: Provided professional staff with efficient, up-to-date, secure and stable voice and data communications, indicating strong proficiency in IT.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Managed to provide services within budget, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Provided voice and data communications, indicating a solid level of proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Managed a staff of seven, suggesting strong proficiency in team management.
